content: Ahead will be a large field full of cobwebs strung from various trees. You can find a Lantern Holder patrolling further back by an archway, and a small shack to the left with a **Treasure Chest** where another Grasshopper Guai will ambush you outside, and Stone Spiders will burrow up inside by the chest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Estate of the Zhu'.
The content is as follows:
Ahead will be a large field full of cobwebs strung from various trees. You can find a Lantern Holder patrolling further back by an archway, and a small shack to the left with a **Treasure Chest** where another Grasshopper Guai will ambush you outside, and Stone Spiders will burrow up inside by the chest.
